text: I believe it's a real tedious hostage negotiation to have a marriage be what it is.
author: Brad Garrett

text: When I got married in my twenties, I had a happy marriage and happy kids but at some point in time I let it go off the rails I let it go off the rails.
author: Stuart Rose

text: My parents had a wonderful marriage, but it was a very dependent relationship. My mother was entirely dependent on my father because that's how it was in those days.
author: Erika Slezak

text: President Bush has a record of cutting taxes, has provided a prescription drug benefit for seniors, has upheld the Second Amendment and remains committed to stopping liberal activists judges who are redefining marriage.
author: Bill Shuster

text: The definition of marriage cannot be disputed. It's right there in black and white and it's been the same since the start of Wikipedia.
author: Jesse Tyler Ferguson
